articles.title: Trump Pitches His MAGA Machine to Tech Bros at SF Fundraiser - The Daily Beast
articles.description: He reportedly raised $12 million, alongside VP hopefuls Doug Burgum and J.D. Vance, as well as the Winklevoss twins.
articles.content: Donald Trump boosted his campaign coffers Thursday night with a San Francisco fundraiser event hosted by a pair of tech investors, reportedly adding another $12 million to his war chest for the Novem… [+2874 chars]

articles.title: ONGC seeks technical help to raise oil, gas output at Mumbai High field - Business Standard
articles.description: The firm has floated an international tender to identify the service provider who will help raise production from the field, ONGC said in a post on X

articles.title: Buy-the-dip didn't work for mutual fund investors on election result day due to 'tech glitch' - The Economic Times
articles.description: Mutual fund investors faced disappointment as a technical glitch led to delayed NAV allotment amid a stock market crash. Many investors demanded compensation for losses incurred due to the glitch.
articles.content: Mutual fund investors, who were looking to buy the dip as the stock market crashed on Tuesday amid election results, were disappointed as a "technical glitch" delayed execution and they were allotted… [+2985 chars]
